description: Three individuals, including an elderly man and a woman, were discovered deceased inside a car near Delhi's Peeragarhi flyover. Police are investigating the circumstances, exploring possibilities of triple suicide or homicide. A strong odor of a poisonous substance was detected, and a soft drink bottle has been sent for forensic analysis to ascertain the cause of death.

Delhi pit death case: Labourer who 1st spotted biker arrested for not informing authorities
description: A labourer, Yogesh, has been arrested for allegedly failing to report a biker's fall into a deep pipeline pit in Janakpuri. The injured biker, Kamal Dhyani, remained trapped for eight hours before authorities were alerted. The sub-contractor, Rajesh Kumar Prajapati, also arrested, reportedly saw Dhyani but left without informing anyone.

The incident highlights the challenges of fame in the digital age.

description: Malaysia joined India in condemning cross-border terrorism, signaling a stronger alignment on the issue. Prime Minister Modi highlighted clear messages against terror with no double standards or compromise. The bilateral meeting saw numerous agreements signed, spanning defense, security, and economic cooperation, including semiconductors and social security for Indian workers.

title: Rs 3cr Lamborghini, Rs 37-lakh tax dodge: Anonymous email exposes 'supercar scam'
description: An anonymous tip-off has triggered a probe into an alleged Rs 37 lakh road tax evasion on a black Lamborghini Huracan Evo. Investigators uncovered forged invoices and fabricated ownership records, suggesting an attempt to undervalue the luxury vehicle and avoid tax dues. The owner of H1 Car Care and the original buyer are now named as accused.

title: In a 1st for India, desi company gains in-orbit snooping capability, takes ISS pics
description: India's space sector has achieved a significant milestone as Azista Space successfully imaged the International Space Station from its own satellite. This groundbreaking "space watch" capability, demonstrated by the ABA First Runner satellite, marks a first for any Indian company. The feat enhances India's space situational awareness, crucial for protecting national assets in orbit.

Claude 'changes' its 'home page' to make fun of Sam Altman's ChatGPT
description: Anthropic's AI assistant Claude now prominently features 'ad-free chats' on its welcome page. This move follows recent advertisements from Anthropic that humorously pointed out the intrusion of ads within AI conversations. The company emphasizes its commitment to providing a helpful and uninterrupted user experience. This latest development continues Anthropic's public campaign to differentiate itself from competitors like OpenAI.

title: When should you really get your thyroid checked? Doctor explains
description: Your thyroid, a small gland, significantly impacts metabolism, heart rate, and energy. Issues like hypothyroidism and hyperthyroidism manifest as fatigue, weight changes, and anxiety. Autoimmune diseases and nodules also affect its function. Regular screening, especially for women of reproductive age and older adults, is crucial for early detection and management of these vital health concerns.

title: Are you tax aware?
description: Most mass-affluent investors may not have the choices available to HNWIs. The decision to invest tax-efficiently is nevertheless crucial. So, they should first decide on asset allocation

title: The hidden risk in hospitalisation renewals
description: Start renewal/porting process in advance; follow up persistently with intermediary/insurer; do not allow existing policy to lapse until the new cover is formally issued

title: Google employees send letter to top execs demanding to cut ties with DHS
description: Nearly 1,000 Google employees are demanding the company sever ties with the Department of Homeland Security, citing contracts with ICE and CBP. They allege Google's technology fuels "state violence and repression." Employees seek transparency on contracts, a Q&A session, and protection for all workers, calling for an end to complicity in government actions.
